description: Server-side JavaScript code for a database visualization web application using Express.js, handling multiple database types (PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite, MongoDB), including environment variable loading, database connection testing, and API endpoints.

classes.name: DatabaseAdapter
classes.description: Base class for database adapters, defining interface methods for testing connection, retrieving tables, and fetching data.

classes.name: SQLAdapter
classes.description: Abstract class extending DatabaseAdapter, providing implementation for executing SQL queries and retrieving table info.

classes.name: PostgresAdapter
classes.description: Adapter for PostgreSQL database, implementing execute, getTableQuery, and getDataQuery methods.

classes.name: MySQLAdapter
classes.description: Adapter for MySQL database, implementing execute, getTableQuery, and getDataQuery methods.

classes.name: SQLiteAdapter
classes.description: Adapter for SQLite database, implementing execute, getTableQuery, and getDataQuery methods.

classes.name: MongoDBAdapter
classes.description: Adapter for MongoDB, implementing connection, getTables, and getData methods.

methods.name: loadEnvFiles
methods.description: Loads environment variables from .env files for different database types.

methods.name: testConnections
methods.description: Tests connections to configured databases and returns list of available ones.

methods.name: handleApiRequest
methods.description: Generic handler for API requests, executing operations on specified database adapters.
